aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.first: Hello! I am Anghelo Alva, a Computer Engineering student and in my free time I dedicate myself to web development. I am passionate about technology and programming, and I enjoy the opportunity to learn something new every day.
aboutMe.second: Since my first steps into the world of web development, the curiosity to discover how sites were created and the freedom to create practically anything I could imagine kept me deeply involved.
aboutMe.third: I firmly believe in the value of continuous learning and constant improvement. I am convinced that every day brings an opportunity to learn something new, and I am committed to making the most of every experience.
aboutMe.contact: If you want to contact me, you can send me an email to:
